sources.title: MABEL'S WILFUL WAY (1915)
sources.description: MABEL'S WILFUL WAY Keystone-Mutual 1 reel, rel. May 1, 1915 (Idora Park Story) dir. Roscoe Arbuckle, and Mabel Normand? cast: Mabel Normand, Roscoe Arbuckle, Edgar Kennedy, Alice Davenport, Joe Bordeaux finished: 4/23/1915 Location: Idora Park, Oakland, CA, copyright: May 1, 1915

metadata.Plot: As Mabel is dining out with her parents, she begins to find the orchestra's music annoying, and she wanders off to the fairgrounds nearby. There Mabel meets two mischief-loving young men, and she joins them in some of their antics. Meanwhile, Mabel's parents have started to look for her, and they are most unprepared for what they will find.
metadata.Actors: Mabel Normand, Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Edgar Kennedy
